title: My Pixel 3 XL stopped working suddently and I'm not able to reopen it since then.
content:
Charge it with induction and cable = no charge signal
plug is into computer and il seem to detect it but no browsing available.
Hold Power Button 30 sec
hold power button + volume down 30 sec
I tried to locate my device in case of defective screen
I replaced the battery
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
